For those of you who are using the new mapping feature in the latest expansion, Plaxibo has found a great website that has many maps ready to download and install into your EQ Maps directory. Go to the link below and check them out. This link will also be added to the info page's links area, right below the EQ Atlas link.

The forum appears to be down right now. Please bear with us during this downtime. I am working a 16 hour day tomorrow and will not be able to investigate this until later Tuesday night (if its still down by that time! Thanks for your patience and understanding!
3/10/03 ...10:45pm
Forum Probs
By Kamdar
Yesterday, Thallus asked me how I made that new shot of myself. Today I have his answer! Click on the picture below to be taken to the newly updated Photo Guide. It gets a little technical at times, but there is also a lot of basic info on how to take nice EQ pix. Whether it's for a Featured Screenshot or for a new portrait for Guild Magic or your own personal Profile page, there should be something there for anyone that is interested in taking pictures. Or maybe like Thallus, you just want to know how I do it! Remember, you can always get to this section by going to our INFO page and clicking on the links on the right hand side of the page.
3/12/03
Updated Photo Guide
By Kamdar
Also, remember that there is a a lot of helpful stuff on that INFO page. It's not just for new members. There may even be some things there that you didn't even know we had. From registering with Guild Magic and EZBoard to finding out how to contact your fellow guildmates via email... It's all there. So if you haven't been there in awhile, click on that INFO link on the left and check it out.

Also, if you have any ideas for recommended links or see a link that is broken, let me know about it!
After several weeks of discussion, the High Council of the Exodus Fellowship has completed talks with Triton and a merger of the two guilds will take place in one week. Sadly, any member that is below level 50 will have to be let go. The merged guild will have a new name. Several are under consideration. The top contenders are Burley Badgers, Triton: the Next Generation and...
4/1/03
New Merger!
By Kamdar
Click Here...
We again seem to be experiencing some problems with our EZBoard hosted forum. Last night I after I posted a message it came up as 3/21 ! Their were several other bugs as well and as I write this the forum appears to be down. Hopefully the folks at EZBoard will fix these issues asap. I have been to their HELP forums and it appears that many communities are experiencing the same problems. If the board is down for a longer time, please check this news section for the latest announcements.
